titleStmt.title: Jerusalems vvatch-men, the Lords remembrancers: a sermon preached at the Abbie at VVestminster, before both Houses of Parliament, and the Assembly of Divines, upon their solemn fast, Iuly 7. 1643. / By Matth: Nevvcomen M.A. and Minister of the Gospell at Dedham in Essex. Published by order of both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Newcomen, Matthew, 1610?-1669.

titleStmt.title: Jerusalems vvatch-men, the Lords remembrancers: a sermon preached at the Abbie at VVestminster, before both Houses of Parliament, and the Assembly of Divines, upon their solemn fast, Iuly 7. 1643. / By Matth: Nevvcomen M.A. and Minister of the Gospell at Dedham in Essex. Published by order of both Houses of Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. F. for Christopher Meredith at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print on verso of first leaf.
Running title reads: A sermon before the assembly of Lords, Commons, and Divines, upon their fast, Iuly 7. 1643.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
